content:
# FACTORY REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at position(-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of an offshore pump (position -9.5, -0.5), boiler (position -6.0, 1.5), and steam engine (position -1.5, 4.5) connected by pipes. The system is operational with the boiler regularly refilled with coal.

### Iron Mining and Smelting at position(18.5, 73.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Electric mining drill (position 18.5, 73.5) mining iron ore
- Wooden chest (position 18.5, 75.5) collecting iron ore (currently contains 175 iron ore)
- Transport belt (position 19.5, 75.5) to move iron ore
- Stone furnace (position 21.0, 76.0) for smelting iron ore with coal
- Output inserter (position 22.5, 76.5) moving iron plates
- Output chest (position 23.5, 76.5) storing iron plates (currently contains 31 iron plates)
- Additional unused stone furnace (position 19.0, 77.0)

### Copper Mining and Smelting at position(-48.5, 78.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Electric mining drill (position -48.5, 78.5) mining copper ore
- Wooden chest (position -48.5, 80.5) collecting copper ore (currently contains 145 copper ore)
- Stone furnace (position -46.0, 81.0) smelting copper ore with coal
- Output inserter (position -44.5, 81.5) moving copper plates
- Output chest (position -43.5, 81.5) storing copper plates (currently contains 22 copper plates)
- Additional unused stone furnace (position -48.0, 82.0)
- Output inserter (position -43.5, 82.5) taking copper plates from the output chest

### Copper Cable Production at position(3.5, 33.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Input chest for copper plates (position 3.5, 30.5)
- Input inserter (position 3.5, 31.5) moving copper plates
- Assembling machine (position 3.5, 33.5) crafting copper cables
- Output inserter (position 5.5, 33.5) moving copper cables
- Transport belt (position 6.5, 33.5) to collect copper cables
- Output chest (position 7.5, 33.5) storing copper cables

### Electronic Circuit Production at position(17.5, 37.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Input chest for iron plates (position 17.5, 34.5)
- Input inserter (position 17.5, 35.5) moving iron plates
- Input inserter for copper cables (position 15.5, 37.5)
- Assembling machine (position 17.5, 37.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Output inserter (position 17.5, 39.5) moving electronic circuits
- Output chest (position 17.5, 40.5) storing electronic circuits
- Power pole (position 15.5, 39.5) connecting circuit output inserter

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities in occupied spaces
- Always check if a position is already occupied before placing an entity
- When placing a chest at a drop position, first remove any inserters that might be occupying that space
- When placing entities next to each other, ensure there's enough space and no collision with existing entities
- Use the entity map data to verify if a position is free before attempting to place something there

### Errors with inserter placement and orientation
- Ensure inserters are correctly oriented to pick up from the source and drop at the destination
- When an inserter is incorrectly oriented, remove it and place a new one with the correct orientation
- Be precise with inserter coordinates - even small differences can cause placement failures
- When using place_entity_next_to, be aware that the spacing parameter might need adjustment

### Errors with power connections
- Ensure all electrical entities are properly connected to the power grid
- When connecting entities with power poles, make sure they are within range of each other
- Check that steam engines are properly connected to the electrical network

###
